item.title: lxd networking and additional IPs
item.description: now that tilde.team is on a fancy-shmancy new dedi server, i’ve tried to get a secondary IP address assigned to a lxd container (which i plan to use for my personal stuff).

item.title: hi there
item.description: welcome to my tildeblog you are here. i like to mess around with linux sysadmin shtuff. tilde.team is my baby. let me know if you want to get involved. thanks for being awesome.
